Check your connection or subscription status and try again.
To clear error, press and hold robot cleaning button for 15 seconds to reboot. (Error 1007)
Move robot from obstacles that could be blocking its mop arm and resume job. If error persists, tap ‘Learn more’. (Error 1008)
Press %s’s CLEAN button to continue.
Keep %s’s path clear. Check for items on the floor, like a blocked doorway etc.
Cleaning may switch to vacuum-only to avoid mopping carpets. Reboot the robot to reset carpet detection.
You can still get there! Use the app to drive %s to the viewpoint.
Check water tank for leaks. If no leak is visible, fill the tank with water. Wait 30 mins to ensure that there is no leak before resuming.
Ready to vacuum, not mop. The fluid sensor isn’t working. Press %s’s button for 9 secs to reboot.
Ready to vacuum, not mop. Sensor isn’t working. Press %s’s button for 9 secs to reboot.

"%1$s
%2$s Badge!"
Congratulations! You just unlocked the:
Maiden Voyage
Birthday Party
"Happy birthday %1$s! A little cake to celebrate? Not to worry, %1$s will clean up when you're done."
Best Friend
"Best friends count on each other, like you've counted on %s to complete the last 50 cleaning missions. Go ahead and brag about your BFF."
Spring Clean
"It's that time of year, spring cleaning! Let %s do the work for you."
%s just completed its inaugural run. This is the start of a beautiful friendship. Not to mention, a clean one!
Time Saver (5 hours)
"Your wish for more hours in the day has come true. By letting %s do the work, you've earned 5 hours back. Now go and have fun!"
Time Saver (20 hours)
"You've almost got a full day back! It's like a leap year. So go ahead, start a hobby, watch your favourite movie trilogy..."
Time Saver (40 hours)
"Friends noticing your clean floors and that relaxed look on your face? Not surprising, as the time you've saved with your %s is similar to a week off!"
Dirt Buster
%s has now picked up the equivalent of a wheelie bin full of dirt off your floor. Cool? Gross? It could go either way.
Roomba Mile
Go %s! Your robot has now driven one mile while vacuuming. Keep pressing CLEAN!
Marathon Medal
26.2 miles driven - give that Roomba a medal!! %s is going the distance to clean your home.
Globetrotter
%s has driven the distance of 1/100th of the way around the earth while cleaning. Keep pressing CLEAN!
Six Months Sidekick
"Feel the love! It's been six months since the first time you pushed CLEAN. Happy half birthday %s!"
%1$s will clean at %2$s
I just unlocked the Maiden Voyage Badge!
"%s amazes me at every turn. So far, it has picked up the equivalent of a wheelie bin full of dirt off my floors. Don't judge. What's on your floors?"
"I've just unlocked the Roomba Mile Badge!"
This is one busy robot. %1$s has already driven one mile while vacuuming my floors for me. Keep going, %1$s!
"I've just unlocked the Marathon Medal Badge!"
%s has driven the full distance of a marathon while cleaning my home. Apparently those trips under the bed and around the chair legs are adding up. Give this robot a medal!
"I've just unlocked the Globetrotter Badge!"
I knew %s was covering some serious ground, but wow! It has now driven the distance of 1/100th of the way around the earth while cleaning my home.
"I've just unlocked the Six Months Sidekick Badge!"
"Six months ago today I handed over the vacuuming to %1$s. It's one of the best things I've ever done. Thanks %1$s!"
"I've just unlocked the Birthday Party Badge!"
"I don't know who was more productive – %1$s or me? %1$s vacuumed my floors at the push of a button. I could get used to this."
"Happy birthday %1$s! It's my robot's special day, but I feel like I got the gift. Thanks %1$s for all the time you've saved me over the past year. Here's to many more!"
"I've just unlocked the Best Friend Badge!"
Is it possible to be best friends with a robot? Of course, especially one that does so much for me. %1$s has cleaned my floors 50 times so far. Thanks, %1$s!
"I've just unlocked the Spring Clean Badge!"
"This year, I'm leaving the job to my vacuum cleaning robot!...Thanks %s, I'll be outside enjoying the sunshine if you need me."
My Roomba just completed its first mission! Clean floors at the push of a button? I could get used to this! #iRobotRoomba
By letting Roomba vacuum my floors, my wish for more hours in the day has come true. Thanks #iRobotRoomba!
My floors are cleaner and my to-do list shorter. That means more time for fun. I love this robot! #iRobotRoomba
"My Roomba has cleaned for a total of 40 hours. It's like I'm accruing my own holiday time! Thanks #iRobotRoomba"
"My Roomba has picked up the equivalent of a wheelie bin full of dirt from my floors. Don't judge. What's on your floors? #iRobotRoomba"
"I've just unlocked the Time Saver (5 hours) Badge!"
My Roomba has already driven one mile throughout my home while vacuuming my floors for me. Keep going, Roomba! #iRobotRoomba
"Those trips cleaning under the bed are adding up. Roomba is officially a marathon runner. It's gone 26.2 miles round my house! #iRobotRoomba"
Got the iRobot Globetrotter Badge! Roomba has now driven the distance of 1/100th of the way around the earth cleaning my home. #iRobotRoomba
"Six months ago today I handed over the vacuuming to my Roomba. It's one of the best things I've ever done. Thanks, Roomba! #iRobotRoomba"
"Happy birthday, Roomba! Thanks for all the time you've saved me over the past year. Here's to many more! #iRobotRoomba"
Is it possible to be best friends with a robot? Yes, especially one that does so much for me. 50 cleaning missions so far! #iRobotRoomba
"Spring cleaning? Roomba's got it covered. Thanks, little robot! I'll be outside enjoying the sunshine if you need me. #iRobotRoomba"
"My wish for more hours in the day has come true. %s vacuumed my floors this week, so I've earned 5 hours back. What should I do with them?"
"I've just unlocked the Time Saver (20 hours) Badge!"
"Body Copy: I'm saving so much time by letting %s vacuum my floors for me. My to-do list is getting shorter, leaving more room for fun. What should I do?"
"I've just unlocked the Time Saver (40 hours) Badge!"
"You may have noticed my new relaxed attitude. These things happen when you save 40 hours by letting %s do the cleaning. It's like a holiday!"
"I've just unlocked the Dirt Buster Badge!"
